solution_line_template: In the morning, the store gives away {bikes_morning} bikes * {clamps_per_bike} bike clamps = <<{bikes_morning}*{clamps_per_bike}={clamps_morning}>>{clamps_morning} bike clamps.
In the afternoon, they give away {bikes_afternoon} bikes * {clamps_per_bike} bike clamps = <<{bikes_afternoon}*{clamps_per_bike}={clamps_afternoon}>>{clamps_afternoon} bike clamps.
So in total, the store has given away {clamps_morning} + {clamps_afternoon} = <<{clamps_morning}+{clamps_afternoon}={total_clamps}>>{total_clamps} bike clamps.
